messages.messageBody:
> Grass??? Am I missing something you're alluding to?

Suzuki means "Sacred tree" or something akin to that. I was unsure
what to choose, so I thought of the grass around the tree...as well as
the Bertie Bott's Jelly Bean that tastes like grass.

--M.

messages.subject: Re: Shinsengummies...?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Grass???  Am I missing something you re alluding to?  (If it s in PMK, I m only up to episode 16). No, Suzuki should be firecracker red with a cinnamon
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Shimazu Masayoshi" <patriot014@h...>
wrote:

>>Suzuki--Grass flavor <<

Grass??? Am I missing something you're alluding to? (If it's in
PMK, I'm only up to episode 16).

No, Suzuki should be firecracker red with a cinnamon red-hot
flavor... maybe a white coconut-flavored spot in the center... in
honor of him rebelling against the Shinsengumi and joining up with
the Sekihoutai. :-D

phil (gotta stick up for my Sekihoutai guys... grass... hn... how did
he come up with grass?)

messages.subject: Shinsengummies...?
messages.msgSnippet: This actually reminds me of the Bertie Bott s All-Flavored Beans , from  Harry Potter. This being said...Kondou, Hijikata, and the 10 captains... --M.
messages.messageBody:
This actually reminds me of the "Bertie Bott's All-Flavored Beans",
from Harry Potter. This being said...Kondou, Hijikata, and the 10
captains...

--M.
================================

Kondou-- Multiple-daifuku (Japanese sweets) flavor-- since he liked to
stuff several sweets into his mouth at a time.

Hijikata-- The flavor of the ultra ULTRA sour version of the WarHeads
candy-- the one that makes your mouth want to explode.

Okita-- Cherry blossom flavor-- very light, and will vanish before you
know it.

Nagakura-- Stomped vegetable flavor

Saitou-- Soba/ramen flavor (brought to you by Maruchan...lol)

Matsubara-- Sweat flavor (since he was so big and trained so much)

Takeda-- Rainbow Sherbet flavor (nudge nudge)...

Inoue-- Moldy flavor

Tani-- Watery, with a light lime flavor

Toudou-- Tangerine flavor

Suzuki--Grass flavor

Harada-- Ayu-nee's extra-special large adzuki rice flavor
